title: Teisou Kannen ZERO Shinsouban 1
description:
1. Umi to Teisou Zero Oyako
2. Souma Souko no Nichijou (The Daily Life of Souma Souko)
3. Souma Sayoko no Nichijou (The Daily Life of Souma Sayoko)
4. Mama wa Uwaki Yariman
5. Souma Kurumi no Nichijou (The Daily Life of Souma Kurumi)
6. Souma Souko no Kekkon (The Marriage of Souma Souko)
7. Arishi Hi no Souma Ie: Prelude (Souma Family in the Old Days: Prelude)
8. Souma Ikka no Kyuujitsu
10. Manager Souma Souko
